title: Walmart to buy India's Flipkart for $16 bln
text:
Walmart to buy India's Flipkart for $16 bln 1:27pm EDT - 01:14
Walmart will pay $16 billion for a roughly 80 percent stake in Indian online marketplace Flipkart as it opens up another front to battle Amazon in one of the world's fledgling e-commerce markets. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
